column1: # Title: Domestic water use efficiency from Shiklomanov
# Comments: The data here are computed as municipal water consumption / withdrawals for 7 global regions; these data were presented in more aggregate form in Shiklomanov 2000

column2: World Water Resources and Their Use. Joint SHI/UNESCO Product. Data tables available 11/7/2020 at https://hydrologie.org/DON/html/PART'3/_Read'me.html
